short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to ease the nerve-wracking challenge of the Chrome browser's Dino game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Chrome Dino Game Cheat Plugin, a new extension designed to enhance your experience with the Google Chrome Dino Game. Whether you're frustrated by constant failures or just looking for a fun twist, this plugin offers various modes to help you overcome the game's challenges effortlessly. Features include invincibility, infinite speed, slow speed, increased jump height, flying, and automatic gameplay. Easily install the plugin from the Chrome Web Store and enjoy a stress-free and enjoyable Dino Game experience. Share your ideas and suggestions to help improve the plugin and make the game even more fun for everyone!
